/circle6 If the bleeding persists and the uterus continues to be in the relaxed state (i.e. it is soft  ), 
make arrangements for transporting the woman to the FRU, where facilities for blood 
transfusion and appropriate surgical care are available. 
/circle6 Do not give the woman anything to eat or drink since she may require an obstetric 
intervention under anaesthesia.
